text:
Looking at this historical letter, I can identify the following information:

From the letterhead and content:
- Sender: Dr. RUD. SPEICH from BASEL
- Date: 26.Mai 1958.SF.EF (May 26, 1958)
- Recipient: Herrn Dr.Max Vischer at St.Albangraben 8, BASEL
- Title: The letter doesn't have a formal title
- Signature: The letter is signed "Rud. Speich"
